div.p: Year 10, 25 Mecheir. Has paid to the bank at Hermonthis, headed by Dionysios, for the prostimon of year 9, Horos, son of Nechouthes, three talents, that are 3 talents, and the taxes due, Dionysios banker, (total:) 4 talents 1200 drachmas. Translation: K. Vandorpe â€“ K.A. Worp, CdE 88 (2013) 106
